column5: Private property with a really nice newly remodeled cabin nestled in woods with deer strolling by daily. Private off road drive. New BBQ / table and chairs under shade of huge trees. Play a game of horse shoes while your steaks are cooking. Just blocks from Main Street. Cabin sleeps 5 with full bottom bunk and twin on top. Also has a full size sleeper sofa. Water park, Medina lake and river, horse bake riding and more with in 10 miles.
